name: Clarion Inn

reviews.text: In my case, I didn't have a choice. It was what was available for a meeting in the area. I read the reviews and cringed at the thought of staying here but just hoped for the best. Check-in was quick and easy. Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. We were directed to our room and upon opening the door to the hallway of rooms, noticed that there were several blowers on down the hallway. Apparently, the hotel cleaned the rugs in an entire bank of hallways and rooms and the carpets were still soaking wet. Upon entering our room, our feet squished into the rug and upon feeling it, realized it too was soaking wet. We had to walk around our room with shoes on. No need to change rooms - they were all the same. With the wet floors came the wet smell. Not pleasant. We had wallpaper falling down due to a previous water problem in the corner of the room and the caulking in the bathroom was all moldy. It is dated and in desperate need of repair. However, all of the staff was great and did what they could with what they had.
reviews.title: STAY ONLY IF YOU HAVE TO!

reviews.text: Pleasant check-in. Coffee and more available 24 hours.
reviews.title: Worked out nicely, would stay again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In room: convenient power outlets, strong shower & fan, shower was a 3/4 style with a seat.
reviews.title: The Whole Package at a Reasonable price

reviews.text: Typical Clarion amenities in linens, both foam and feather pillows.
reviews.title: Great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: AC struggled a bit on a 90F+ hot day to cool down room. After 30 min was fine, and then very cool for sleeping. Both the AC and the mini-fridge were rather quiet compared to other hotels.
reviews.title: Best Value

reviews.text: Booked it thru Priceline and when I saw some of the reviews I thought about eating the reservation but I didn't
reviews.title: Much nicer than some review
Great service
reviews.text: Rooms were very clean. There was a small stain on the carpet. Had 2 newspapers in the room. Nice touch
Shower massage head was great. And water hot. Kind of like a pressure washer
reviews.title: Awful Awful

reviews.text: The disappointing part was a strange charge that showed up on my credit card almost $100 for misc. called the hotel and they claimed it was a mistake. ??
reviews.title: Another Excellent Stay

reviews.text: I would stay there again. Ez drive to airport and there is a couple of restaurant. Close by that I like
reviews.title: Women travelling alone beware...

reviews.text: Park-Sleep-Fly: Room shabby, but pleasant staff and OK for a quick overnight. Bag breakfast and shuttle to airport at 5 AM were fine. BUT returning we waited over an hour for pick-up in the cold wind after a trip to a tropical paradise. The "return van" was smaller than the first and there were six of us plus luggage to fit in. The other family included an elderly man, and we had a young grandson with us. A lot of "pass-the-buck" that no-one had notified the van driver (I had called the hotel THREE times and been told driver was "on the way")....rather aggravating.
reviews.title: Clarion near Bradley Airport-Hartford
Meh. Not quite a 2.5 star. More like 2.
reviews.text: Will Clarion pay for my doctor visit for a VERY bad sinus infection???

reviews.title: Go Elsewhere, Fast
reviews.text: BHS

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is not very close to the airport. So make sure you realize that. The shuttle will still pick you up and drop you off (mine even brought me to the rental car place), but it's by no means close to the airport. Expect a 20 minute drive—plan on that when you call for a pickup.
reviews.title: Time to Refurbish

reviews.text: The rooms are slightly dated and are closer, in my opinion, to a 2 star hotel in quality. But this was an okay stay. No major complaints. Bathroom counter was nicely remodeled.
reviews.title: Baby, It's Cold Inside

reviews.text: My family and I are on an East Coast 14 day trip....staying in many different hotels within the Choice Hotel Family. This hotel was the absolute worst hotel I have been in-in 46 years!
reviews.title: .....stay someplace else......

reviews.text: 1.The hotel restaurant is closed for remodeling---nothing on webpage saying that--not even mentioned at check-in
reviews.title: this is more like a 1 star

reviews.text: 2. After getting to our room-the bathroom door is a "pocket" door which is broken off the track and cannot be closed! After asking for maintenance or a different room-we were given a different room----only to see the employee on duty to turn around and give that room to the next person in line!!!!!
reviews.title: A pleasant stay

reviews.text: 3. The new room---has a sliding glass door to access a courtyard type area......where there is a large number of people gathered and grilling out----not a common sight for a hotel! It appeared to us that they were living there-but do not know that as a fact!
reviews.title: Staff was incredible, room was ok.

reviews.text: 4. Going out the side door to retrieve some stuff from the car-we are greeted by a young foreign boy telling us that we had to keep the door propped open with a rock so that they all could get in and out!!!! they are secured by key cards for a reason!!!!!!!!!!! no security whatsoever
reviews.title: Chocolate Cookies at Check in

description: Newly renovated, full-service hotel conveniently located between Hartford, CT and Springfield, MA. Minutes away from Bradley International Airport. Free WIFI, Airport Shuttle, Deluxe Continental Breakfast & choice privileges rewards program.On site restaurant and Bar . Easy on/off I-91 Exit 45 .
